textAfterTable: Its time to reclaim the throne as Kings of Winter. The Game of Thrones Distressed Stark Sigil Hoodie features a distressed direwolf, the sigil of House Stark. The fearsome direwolf bears his teeth in a distressed print on this soft hoodie, perfect for keeping warm as winter comes. S M L XL XXL Body Length 28.5 29.5 30.5 31.5 32.5 Chest Width 21 23 24.5 26.5 27.5 Sleeve Length 34.5 35.5 36.5 37.5 38.5 REVIEW SNAPSHOT® by PowerReviews DA - HBO Game of Thrones Distressed Stark Sigil Hoodie   4.6 (based on 115 reviews) 98% of respondents would recommend this to a friend.
